text: Timothy James "Tim" Curry (19 April 1946), is an English actor and singer. He is well known for his roles in The Rocky Horror Picture Show, Clue, It, Home Alone 2: Lost in New York and The Three Musketeers. He has released three albums. ==Personal life and stroke== Curry resides in Toluca Lake, Los Angeles, California.Chris Thompson, 'Shake It Up!' and 'Bosom Buddies' scribe, dead at 63 - UPI.com Retrieved 2016-12-28. In July 2012, Curry suffered a major stroke. As a result of the stroke, he now uses a wheelchair. ==Filmography== Year Title Role Director Notes 1975 Dr. Frank N.
